title: entMoviesApp
description: Entertainment web application that allows to search for their favorite movies. The application sorts movies into two categories. Additionally, the application allows you to add a movie to your favorites list. I created this application as challange from frontendmentor.com

features.feature: Input for searching for relevant shows
Add/Remove bookmarks from all movies and TV series

title: audiophileShop
description: E-commerce that allows add, remove and change quantity products with form and summary. I created this application as challange from frontendmentor.com

features.feature: Edit product quantities in the cart
Calculating the total cost (include Vat and delivery)

title: Lifecal
description: Meet my calorie and macro tracking app, designed to simplify nutrition monitoring. I can calculate your daily caloric needs, log meals by time, and even let you add your own custom meals.

features.feature: Calculating your daily calorie requirement and the macros you need
Displays consumed calories and macronutrients, providing a clear overview of your nutritional intake
Segregation of the type of meals
Possibility of adding your own meal

title: SkillSphere
description: My first fullstack web application with authentication and authorization system. Online learning platform that allows to search and purchase courses, as well as create your own. Additionally, the website boasts an extensive review system, enabling users to provide valuable feedback on courses. The application is not complete yet.

features.feature: Reviews system (create, edit, delete) to each course
